requiredEquipmentExplanation: This video "15 Minute Energy Cleanse (Guided Meditation)" does not require any physical fitness equipment. The focus of the video is on guided meditation, energy cleansing, and mindfulness, as indicated by the title and repeated references in the tags and description. The workout is primarily about visualization, breathing, and mental relaxation rather than physical activity. There are no mentions of physical exercises or equipment in the title, description, or tags. User comments also reflect the meditative and emotional impact of the content rather than any physical exercise, confirming it is a bodyweight-only meditation session requiring no equipment.
